li.label: darkness
li.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.

li.label: ratty apparel
li.description: The holes in my outfit are annoyingly large. Can't I get something new to wear?

li.label: tattered apparel
li.description: This thing looks like it's about to fall apart. Can't I wear something that doesn't belong in a trash heap?

li.label: tainted {0}
li.description: I am wearing a piece of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: tainted {0} (+1)
li.description: I am wearing two pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: tainted {0} (+2)
li.description: I am wearing three pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: tainted {0} etc
li.description: I am wearing four or more pieces of apparel that someone died in. It creeps me out and feels dirty.

li.label: human leather {0}
li.description: Wearing human leather is disturbing. Who could do this?

li.label: human leather {0} (+1)
li.description: I'm dressed like an insane person.

li.label: human leather {0} (+2)
li.description: I think there may be a face on my clothes. Oh, no... my clothes *are* a face.

li.label: human leather {0} etc
li.description: I look like a freak from a horror show, and I feel like I'm in a horror show.

li.label: human leather {0}
li.description: I enjoy wearing the suffering of others.

li.label: human leather {0} (+1)
li.description: This will scare them. All will know my power.

li.label: human leather {0} (+2)
li.description: The faces on my clothes aren't smiling, but they make *me* happy.

li.label: human leather {0} etc
li.description: The flesh! The flesh signals my triumph!

li.label: sick
li.description: I don't feel very well.

li.label: chilly
li.description: I'm uncomfortably cold.

li.label: cold
li.description: I'm so cold, I'm shivering.

li.label: numbing cold
li.description: I can't stop shivering. My teeth are chattering. All I can think of is getting warm.

li.label: absolutely freezing
li.description: My teeth are chattering so hard I can barely speak. My toes are numb. I need to get warm.

li.label: sweaty
li.description: It's too hot here. I'm sweating.

li.label: hot
li.description: It's way too hot here. If I could just have a breath of cool air...

li.label: sweltering hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: blistering hot
li.description: This place is searing hot. I think I could die from this heat!
